sentences.en: Bob and Jenny sang a duet.
sentences.cn: 鲍勃和詹妮表演了一首二重唱.

sentences.en: From two duet, a question and answer.
sentences.cn: 由二人对唱 、 一问一答.

sentences.en: I sang a duet at a Karaoke bar.
I sing with Mike in duet.
I sing with someone in duet.
John sang in with Joan in a duet last night.
sentences.cn: 昨晚约翰和琼唱了二重唱.

sentences.en: Kelly: Well that's what music is made for! Lets do a duet!
sentences.cn: 凯利: 当然,这正是音乐的作用! 让我们来一段二重唱吧!

sentences.en: Sing once again with me our strange duet.
sentences.cn: 再和我唱一次,这奇怪的二重唱.

sentences.en: Soon the duet will become a trio.
sentences.cn: 很快地二重奏形成了三重唱.

sentences.en: That spiraling, darkly modern duet reminded Kauffman of his home image.
sentences.cn: 旋绕忧郁的现代二重奏使考夫曼想起了他的最初的影象.

sentences.en: The famous star and his partner will give duet at the concert.
sentences.cn: 这位著名的歌星和他的合作者将在音乐会上表演二重唱.

sentences.en: The main concert is basically a form of and answer form duet.
sentences.cn: 主要的演唱形式基本是一问一答的对唱形式.

sentences.en: There is a piano duet by two Italians.
sentences.cn: 有意大利人的钢琴二重奏.

sentences.en: They were playing duet on a piano.
sentences.cn: 他们用钢琴在练二重唱.

sentences.en: Tonight she sings a duet with first husband Maurice Gibb.
sentences.cn: 今晚她与第一任丈夫莫里斯∙吉布表演了二重唱。

trans.tran_en: a piece of music for two singers or players
